child.name: (b) The following are prerequisites for enrolling in the upper-division undergraduate minor courses:
Transfer students should check with their college counselor for established equivalencies for these prerequisite courses.
Students not taking MGMT 30A and MGMT 30B at UCI during regular session or summer session must complete MGMT 131A with a minimum grade of B.
(r) NOTE: Individual courses that students may select within the minor may require additional prerequisites.
